meanings.definition: A shield or emblem bearing a coat of arms
meanings.sent1: The knight proudly displayed his family's escutcheons on his shield.
meanings.sent2: The royal family's escutcheons were beautifully painted on the castle walls.
meanings.sent3: The artist mistakenly painted the escutcheons upside down, creating a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: The escutcheons of the ancient warriors seemed to glow with honor and history.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the escutcheons made them stand out among the other decorations.

meanings.definition: A decorative or protective plate surrounding a keyhole or drawer pull
meanings.sent1: The antique cabinet had ornate escutcheons that added elegance to its design.
meanings.sent2: She carefully polished the brass escutcheons to make them shine in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the dangling escutcheons, causing a playful mess.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion's escutcheons whispered stories of the secrets hidden behind closed doors.
meanings.sent5: The jeweled escutcheons sparkled like tiny stars against the dark wood of the cabinet.
